quests.desc: Welcome to another life changing episode of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First off, ensure that the box is open. If you have pulled open the box, pick up the formless key from the box in the kitchenette. If you can get your hands on the formless key, unlock the formless safe within the kitchenette with the formless key. After that, open the formless safe. And then, take the Microsoft limited edition passkey from the formless safe in the kitchenette. With the Microsoft limited edition passkey, unlock the Microsoft limited edition gateway. After that, open the Microsoft limited edition gateway within the kitchenette. After that, make an attempt to head east. Next, recover the peanut from the rack in the pantry. Once you have picked up the peanut, eat the peanut. Once that's all handled, you can stop!
commands: unlock formless safe with formless key
take Microsoft limited edition passkey from formless safe
unlock Microsoft limited edition gateway with Microsoft limited edition passkey

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
This is going to sound unbelievable, but you've just entered a pantry.

 You see a trunk. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The trunk is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can make out a rack. I guess it's true what they say, if you're looking for a rack, go to TextWorld. [if there is something on the s_0]You see [a list of things on the s_0] on the rack.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]The rack appears to be empty. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] Microsoft limited edition gateway leading west. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a kitchenette. An usual kind of place.

 You can see [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] formless safe.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The formless safe contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The formless safe is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can make out a box.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The box contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The box is empty![end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] Microsoft limited edition gateway leading east. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading north.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
You're now in a closet.



There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a dish-pit. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a shower. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You've entered a cookhouse.

 You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a platter. [if there is something on the s_1]On the platter you make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if] Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a plate. The plate is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_2] On the plate you see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] However, the plate, like an empty plate, has nothing on it. Hm. Oh well[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

walkthrough: unlock formless safe with formless key
take Microsoft limited edition passkey from formless safe
unlock Microsoft limited edition gateway with Microsoft limited edition passkey

objective: You are now playing a life changing round of TextWorld! First of all, you could, like, ensure that the box inside the kitchenette is open. And then, take the formless key from the box. After getting the formless key, unlock the formless safe inside the kitchenette with the formless key. And then, ensure that the formless safe in the kitchenette is open. And then, recover the Microsoft limited edition passkey from the formless safe. Then, make sure that the Microsoft limited edition gateway in the kitchenette is unlocked with the Microsoft limited edition passkey. Once you have unlocked the Microsoft limited edition gateway, ensure that the Microsoft limited edition gateway inside the kitchenette is open. Then, attempt to venture east. And then, recover the peanut from the rack inside the pantry. And then, eat the peanut. Once that's all handled, you can stop!
